channel.title: Why cant i run server on laptop?
channel.description:
im currently tryin to run a server on my laptop (toshiba ) and it had 4bg ram and some other stuff that was alot better than my computer my computer on the otherhand which was wireless could run a server, ive done all the same steps on laptop and cant run could any 1 tell me problem? thankz your help would be great :D
i have also followed all guides on these forums to try and get it up and i did not sucseed,[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 05:20:50 pm[/size][hr]come on reply!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2009, 06:15:27 pm[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Why cant i run server on laptop?
item.dc:creator: @Full_Throttle Full Throttle
item.description:
@Full_Throttle wrote:

Be sure to have portforwarded correctly, did you remember to add your server to the firewall in exceptions tab?

Read full topic
item.source: Why cant i run server on laptop?
